amendment.description: Amendment establishes a lock-box procedure for appropriations bills which is designed to capture savings from floor amendments that cut spending and dedicate such funds to reducing the Federal deficit.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to amend the 1974 Budget Act to create a lock-box for each appropriation bill which is designed to capture savings from floor amendments that cut spending in order to reduce the federal budget deficit. The amendment applies to House, Senate and Conference versions of all appropriations bills.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Crapo amendment (A013) Agreed to by recorded vote: 314 - 109 (Roll no. 271).
